title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 401 - Comprehensive Annual Social Services Program Plan
content:

State Regulations
§ 401.1 - Comprehensive annual social services program plan
§ 401.2 - Service program year
§ 401.3 - Submission and approval of the proposed district component
§ 401.4 - Public review of proposed comprehensive annual social services program plan
§ 401.5 - Revised district component
§ 401.6 - Publication of final comprehensive annual social services program plan
§ 401.7 - Amendments to comprehensive annual social services program plan

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 401

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
